column5: Alright, I am a newbie to this board, so I am probably going to take some heat for this....but its worth a shot.  I am willing to take 2 tickets to the Sportsman show off of anyone who doesnt want them hahah....   Hint Hint TJ ahha  Its worth a shot
Hmm....you got a pic of yourself that makes you look like a total fool?  TJ may just feel sorry for you if you post it....LOL  And yes...it is worth a shot.
once i get the folder on the network i am good to go with the pictures....no pictures of me looking like a fool but I would be willing to take one hahah

All I have to do is look like an idiot to get tickets? lol  I have a pic of myself when I was about 10...  knee high socks, a half top, wrist bands holding 2 largemouth bass   My gf blew a few of the pics up and put them all over my house for my 30th b-day last year...

hahaha oh no what have i started. I want tickets.  Maybe there should be a thread started for posting the most foolish pics of everyone.  TJ, this doesnt mean give them tickets, this was my pathetic plea for tickets haha
